text:
The [[immortal]] spirit known as the Smith of Souls tends the [[husksteel]] forge in [[Dolurrh]] known as the [[Crucible]]. She wears a mask of black steel and an apron of
dragonhide. Her form is highly mutable, and changes based on the object she is creating; when forging [[marut]]s, she takes the form of a [[giant]], and when crafting tiny trinkets, a [[gnome]]. It's possible
that she collects the memories of mortal artisans, and can
replicate their works at her forge.
title: Smith of Souls
